General.Name: China Railway Construction Heavy Industry Corp Ltd
General.Description: China Railway Construction Heavy Industry Corporation Limited researches, designs, manufactures, and services underground engineering and rail transit systems in China and internationally. The company offers tunnel boring machines, drilling and shafting equipment, rail track and transit system, agricultural machines, green building materials construction equipment, and mine construction equipment. It also provides construction materials, including fiber reinforced composite pipes, bars, bolts, storage tanks, cable supports and trays, as well as fiber composite emergency evacuation platform, basalt asphalt chopped yarn, composite cable/tunnel trench cover, and composite protective covers for the third rail of the subway. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Changsha, China. China Railway Construction Heavy Industry Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of China Railway Construction Corporation Limited.

1.Name: Mr. Xiang  Tang
1.Title: CFO, Sec. of the Board, Deputy GM & Gen. Counsel
